settings.text:
We believe jewelry is meant to be worn and are here to help you revive your jewelry box.

The Heirloom Revival mission is: wear more, buy less. The largest diamond mine is in our homes. Let's start putting those stones to use. It's our responsibility as citizens of earth, the future of fine jewelry and so sentimental.

Heirloom Revival is here to help you recycle and remake your most precious objects. Heirloom Revival projects typically start at $2000 depending on the design, stone size and metal.

settings.heading: We believe jewelry is meant to be worn and are here to help you revive your jewelry box.

The Heirloom Revival mission is: wear more, buy less. The largest diamond mine is in our homes. Let's start putting those stones to use. It's our responsibility as citizens of earth, the future of fine jewelry and so sentimental.

Heirloom Revival is here to help you recycle and remake your most precious objects. Heirloom Revival projects typically start at $2000 depending on the design, stone size and metal.

settings.heading: Featured Heirloom Revival Pieces
settings.description: Add a short description for this section. Engagement Ring into Signet Ring. Engagement Ring into Signet Ring

Before:

Your engagement ring featured a classic white gold pavé band, with delicate rows of diamonds adding sparkle along the shank. While beautiful, the design leaned toward a traditional look that could feel less distinct over time.
After:

The ring has been transformed into an elegant 18K bezel-set design, offering a modern silhouette that highlights the center stone with refined simplicity. This heirloom revival not only enhances durability but also gives the piece a fresh, contemporary elegance while preserving its sentimental value.

settings.heading: Engagement Ring Refresh - White Gold Pave Band into 18K Bezel Set
settings.text: Your heirloom engagement ring has been refreshed from a white gold pavé band into a timeless 18K bezel-set design, giving it a modern yet enduring elegance. This revival preserves the sentiment of your original ring while enhancing its brilliance and durability for everyday wear.

settings.heading: Engagement Ring to Signet Ring
settings.content: Sophie wanted a band that would complement her engagement ring while still standing beautifully on its own. We worked with her to create a matching Ripple & Shadow Band that echoes the organic flow of her original design, bringing balance and harmony to her set. The result is a timeless piece that celebrates both continuity and individuality, crafted to be worn and cherished every day.

settings.text: Select a piece(s) from your jewelry collection that holds sentimental value but doesn't suit your style. We recommend only picking 1-3 pieces to start with, otherwise it can get overwhelming. And if you are having any hesitation on if you want to take apart your piece or not, it’s best to not.

settings.heading: Think About Your New Design & Obtain an Estimate

settings.text:
Look around our site and socials for inspiration! If your stones are about the same size as the stones (regardless of shape or cut) in the picture you like, the design is probably possible!

To get a price estimate email us with any questions: heirloomrevival@starlingjewelry.com OR fill out the contact form below. As a rough guide our revivals are generally between $2000 - $5000.

settings.heading: More Featured Heirloom Revival Pieces
settings.description: Add a short description for this section. Engagement Ring into Signet Ring. Engagement Ring into Signet Ring

settings.title: 3. Reserve A Revival Spot
settings.text: Reserve your Heirloom Revival spot here—only 10 per month, $200 non-refundable deposit, process takes 8–10 weeks.

settings.title: 4. Send In Your Jewelry
settings.text: In the first week of your chosen month, we’ll send a shipping kit with instructions, jewelry bags, and a prepaid label—please follow the safety guidelines and reach out with any questions.

settings.title: 5. Inspection & Confirmation
settings.text: Once your heirlooms arrive we’ll confirm your design, provide a final estimate ( shipping, renderings, metalsmithing, and materials), & begin with a 50% deposit—this step takes about 2 weeks.

settings.title: 6. Time to Revive!
settings.text: Your project begins with stone removal, metal prep, and a sketch or CAD rendering for your approval (with up to two edits); this step takes about 2 weeks.

settings.title: 6. Time to Revive!
settings.text: Your project begins with stone removal, metal prep, and a sketch or CAD rendering for your approval (with up to two edits); this step takes about 2 weeks.

Your finished Heirloom Revival is shipped overnight or 2-day, fully insured with signature required. We don’t send sneak peeks—we want your first look to be in person! Mail day has never been better, so please tag us in your unboxing and showing-off videos.

settings.description: Sophie came to us looking for a wedding band that would feel like a true extension of her engagement ring. She loved the organic flow of her Ripple design and wanted a piece that echoed its movement while standing beautifully on its own. Together, we created the Matching Ripple & Shadow Band, a harmonious complement that enhances the brilliance of her original ring. The finished piece feels both modern and timeless, designed to be worn and cherished every day.

settings.title: Can you send designs from our collection you envision your stones in?:
Do you have approximate carat weight or paperwork on your heirloom stones?
Would you like us to offer a credit towards your project from the leftover heirloom material (stones and/or metal) or send this back with your completed piece?:

settings.heading: We would be honored to help you reimagine your heirloom jewelry!
settings.description: We limit our Heirloom Revival Projects to 10 a month, you can reserve a spot here: Heirloom Revival Deposit. Before you leave a deposit, we would love to send a closer estimate tailored to your project design. Can you answer the questions below? I will be able to send a closer estimate with these answers and we can go from there.
settings.upload_helptext: Accepted formats: JPG, PNG, or HEIC.

settings.title: Column
settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.
